code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes,Link}from'react-router-dom';import AlimentoDetalle from'./AlimentoDetalle';import CalculadoraCalorias from'./CalculadoraCalorias';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[alimentos,setAlimentos]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:8000/api/alimentos/?search=".concat(query)).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setAlimentos(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error:',error));},[query]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Alimentos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Inicio"})," | "," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/alimentos",children:"Lista de Alimentos"})," | "," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/calculadora-calorias",children:"Calculadora de Calor\xEDas"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:alimentos.map(alimento=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/alimento/".concat(alimento.id),children:alimento.nombre})},alimento.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Inicio"}),exact:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/alimento/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlimentoDetalle,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/calculadora-calorias",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CalculadoraCalorias,{})})]})]})});}export default App;
